intro: Aspidium championii, commonly known as the African shield fern, is a species of fern native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Athyriaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, shield-shaped fronds. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forests and rocky areas.
